directions.step:
Preheat oven to 375F. In pie plate, beat egg white. Place nuts on waxed paper. Prepare twists as label directs. Roll twists in egg white, then in nuts; place on greased cookie sheet. Bake 15 to 18 minutes until golden.
Recipe by: Good Housekeeping/March 1995
Posted to recipelu-digest by Rodeo46898 <Rodeo46898@aol.com> on Mar 2, 1998
